channel.title: hardcore Iptables
channel.description:
Hello,
Im using a debian host and whonix in virtualbox.
Im a novice at iptables, but still have a basic understanding of them.
Can anyone tell me some iptables commands that can literally prevent everything going in and out ? ie close all ports and allow nothing else except my Whonix Gateway + Whonix Workstations traffic to pass through.
So basically the host would have no internet capabilities.
Thanks
